family.name: geographies
family.description:
**Entry Point:** `/geographies/{scope}/countries`
The geographies resource family provides access to location related data, including lists of countries, and lists of regions by country.

resource.name: countries
resource.description: Provides all the countries available to a scope.

resource.name: regions
resource.description: All the regions available for this country.

resource.name: region
resource.description: All the regions available for this country.

relationship.name: root-to-countries
relationship.description: Countries can be discovered at the root.

relationship.name: regions-for-country
relationship.description: A list of regions for a country.

property.name: name
property.description: The name or code of the country.

property.name: display-name
property.description: The localized country name, intended for display in the client application.

property.name: display-name
